title: champion Mastery point bug
body: I got this problem for almost every of my game but I have no idea what happen. It just can't show the grade and point I have for each game

replies.body: I can confirm that this is purely a visual bug, and that points earned are being added towards your totals for that champion.  It definitely sucks though to not see your grade at the end of a match, and is on the radar to be fixed.
new teric where ? ah i forgot rito doesnt do sht
Correct me if I'm wrong, but isn't this more of a loading issue rather than a bug/glitch?
